mapper.select: SELECT o.order_Id, o.order_Date, o.user_Id, o.hp_Id, o.sm_Id, o.state, h.name as hname, c.real_name, s.name as sname,c.sex FROM orders o JOIN hospital h ON o.hp_Id = h.hp_Id JOIN users c ON o.user_Id = c.user_Id JOIN setmeal s ON o.sm_Id = s.sm_Id
